capstone.ui

Class ThemeWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window
      • capstone.ui.Widget
        • capstone.ui.ThemeWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

    public class ThemeWindow
extends Widget
    The Window managing Themes. This Window is responsible for showing the ThemeCreationWidget if the user wishes to create a new Theme, or else for opening a FileDialog. It is expected to yield a Theme.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

    • Field Detail

      • _theme

        private Theme _theme

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThemeWindow

        public ThemeWindow()
        Constructs a new ThemeWindow. A ThemeWindow has an "Existing Theme" Button, a "New Theme" Button and some utility buttons at the bottom (CANCEL and EXIT).

    • Method Detail

      • theme

        public Theme theme()
        Returns:
        The Theme collected, if any, else null.
